onix.salameche.CRAM16¶

onix.salameche.CRAM16(At, N_0)[source]¶

CRAM uses a Chebishev Rational Approximation Method of order 16 to compute the solution of the matricial depletion equation.

Parameters

  • At (numpy.array) – Depletion matrix multiplied by the time interval over which nuclides are depleted

  • N_0 (numpy.array) – Initial nuclides’ densities vector
